description: Here are a few more hugging face marks that have some words worked in. Actually, the words here only say hug. If you check out our entire category for word emoticons, you can find a monstrously huge selection to choose from! The letters are always fancy and look way cooler than plane English text.  ٩꒰ ˘ ³˘꒱۶ⒽⓤⒼ♥♡̷♡̷ ٩(๑•◡-๑)۶ⒽⓤⒼ❤
title: Words
